description: Azerbaijan says the officer was among 11 Azeri troops killed in three days of fighting with Armenia.
title: Azerbaijan general among troops killed in Armenia border clash
title_page: Azerbaijan general among troops killed in Armenia border clash - BBC News
maintext: The sides accuse each other of starting the latest flare-up, and all eyes are now on Russia. It helped negotiate a ceasefire in 2016 after the so-called "April War" - in which some 200 soldiers and civilians were killed, and the two sides came close to all-out war.
